wikipedia.title: Popular Alternative
wikipedia.summary: Popular Alternative (, AP) is a centre-right and mainly Christian-democratic political party in Italy, founded on 18 March 2017, after the dissolution of New Centre-Right.

wikipedia.title: New Centre-Right
wikipedia.summary: New Centre-Right (, NCD) was a centre-right political party in Italy.
